item.title: Introductory Post
item.description:
Hi!

My name is Ivan Boldyrev, I am software engineer born in Novosibirsk, Russia. My main areas of interest are functional programming, Rust, and big data/highload.

Since the beginning of 2024 I live in Barcelona, Spain.

My favourite projects are:

  • StarJs – astronomical library for JavaScript.
  • FUCC – LALR parser generator for Common Lisp.
  • hdfesse – WIP HDFS library in Rust (originally intended to replace libhdfs).

I am big fan of Emacs and Apple Macbook Air M1. My other hobbies include 3d printing with my son, studying French language, ink pens and reading in general.
